person.persName: Adam T. Harbison (Metcalfe County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Harbison and Frances Harbison. Attended school in Barren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Metcalfe County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a sergeant from December 31, 1861 to January 12, 1865. Wounded at the Battle of Huff's Ferry, Roane County, Tennessee on November 14, 1863.
